descubre_experiencias: Discover unique experiences with restaurants thanks to Mesa YA
contacto_mensaje: If you have any questions, please fill out the form below and we will get in touch with you as soon as possible.
descripcion_empresa: We are a platform that connects food lovers with the best local restaurants. Our mission is to facilitate reservations and enhance the dining experience by providing a comfortable, fast, and efficient service for everyone.
texto_card_1: Save yourself the trouble of going to a restaurant only to find no available tables and having to eat late. MesaYa has the solution!
texto_card_2: You will have more options for events organized by us and discounts at our restaurants.
texto_card_3: Access promotions and exclusive discounts available only for MesaYa users.
no_reservas_confirmadas: There are no confirmed reservations at this time.
revisar_gestionar_reservas: Review and manage your reservations before confirming them.
no_tienes_reservas: You have no reservations in your cart.
mensaje_confirmar_eliminacion: Are you sure you want to delete this reservation? This action cannot be undone.
mantener_ctrl_seleccionar: Hold down the Ctrl or Cmd key to select multiple hours.
cuenta_no_verificada: Your account is not verified. Please check your email to confirm it.
ingresa_correo_para_restaurar: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
introducir_nueva_contrasena: Enter a new password for your account.
correo_verificacion_enviado: We have sent a verification email to your address. Please check your inbox and click the link to activate your account.
reenviar_correo_mensaje: If you have not received the email, you can request it to be resent:
carrusel11: Tired of waiting in endless lines to eat?
carrusel12: At Mesaya, we have the solution to your problem.
carrusel21: Tired of being loyal and not getting rewarded?
carrusel22: At Mesaya, we reward your loyalty with our offers.
carrusel31: Don't have enough money to afford a fancy dinner?
carrusel32: At Mesaya, you'll find a wide variety of restaurants with prices for everyone.
text_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this restaurant?
